resources.string: Set the API URL to an OpenAI Compatible API Server. If you are using the default OpenAI base URL, you need to set an appropriate API Key from https://platform.openai.com/ and increase the Max Tokens to more than 1.

Or if you want to use a self-hosted Language Model, download/setup LM Studio on your PC/Server and run the Local Sever, then set the API URL to point to your LM Studio\'s Local Server\'s http://IP:PORT/. No API Key is required for connecting to a local server.
Visit https://github.com/arunk140/ollm.chat/ for the Source code
Visit https://github.com/arunk140/ollm.chat/blob/main/HowTo.md for the more detailed Help Instructions
